System.M_OUTCTL001: SELECT RTRIM(M.USERID) AS USERID, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.OUT1_PATH),'') AS OUT1_PATH, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.OUT2_PATH),'') AS OUT2_PATH, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.OUT3_PATH),'') AS OUT3_PATH, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.OUT4_PATH),'') AS OUT4_PATH, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.OUT5_PATH),'') AS OUT5_PATH, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_PC, M.ADD_DATE, M.ADD_TIME, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_PC, M.LASTUP_DATE, M.LASTUP_TIME FROM M_OUTCTL AS M
System.M_OUTCTL002: INSERT INTO M_OUTCTL( USERID, OUT_PATH, ADD_USER, ADD_PC, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, LASTUP_USER, LASTUP_PC, LASTUP_DATE, LASTUP_TIME ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
System.M_OUTCTL003: UPDATE M_OUTCTL SET OUT_PATH = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE USERID = ?
System.M_OUTCTL500: SELECT RTRIM(M.USERID) AS USERID, COALESCE(RTRIM(M.OUT_PATH),'') AS OUT_PATH, M.ADD_USER AS ADD_USER, M.ADD_PC AS ADD_PC, M.ADD_DATE AS ADD_DATE, M.ADD_TIME AS ADD_TIME, M.LASTUP_USER AS LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_PC AS LASTUP_PC, M.LASTUP_DATE AS LASTUP_DATE, M.LASTUP_TIME AS LASTUP_TIME FROM M_OUTCTL AS M
System.M_OUTCTL004: SELECT M.USERID, M.OUT1_PATH, M.OUT2_PATH, M.OUT3_PATH, M.OUT4_PATH, M.OUT5_PATH, M.ADD_USER, M.ADD_PC, M.ADD_DATE, M.ADD_TIME, M.LASTUP_USER, M.LASTUP_PC, M.LASTUP_DATE, M.LASTUP_TIME FROM M_OUTCTL M WHERE M.USERID = ?
System.M_OUTCTL005: UPDATE M_OUTCTL SET OUT1_PATH = ?, OUT2_PATH = ?, OUT3_PATH = ?, OUT4_PATH = ?, OUT5_PATH = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE USERID = ?
System.M_OUTCTL006: INSERT INTO M_OUTCTL ( USERID, OUT1_PATH, OUT2_PATH, OUT3_PATH, OUT4_PATH, OUT5_PATH, ADD_USER, ADD_PC, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, LASTUP_USER, LASTUP_PC, LASTUP_DATE, LASTUP_TIME ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
